STUDY.alias: An initial characterisation of the Fasciola hepatica transcriptome using 454-FLX sequencing

IDENTIFIERS.SUBMITTER_ID: An initial characterisation of the Fasciola hepatica transcriptome using 454-FLX sequencing

DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: An initial characterisation of the Fasciola hepatica transcriptome using 454-FLX sequencing
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: A transcriptomic survey of Fasciola hepatica with the aim of increasing the amount of sequence information about this organism's transcriptome.
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_DESCRIPTION: A transcriptomic survey of Fasciola hepatica with the aim of increasing the amount of sequence information about this organism's transcriptome.

STUDY_ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: ISAcreator and ISA-TAB format via EBI BioInvestigationIndex
Advanced Genomics Facility, University of Liverpool
